page.content:
• Very basic timeline design. Using PHP and mySQLi for basic CRUD operations. Using jquery.masonry for the UI design.
  • Credits to Srinivas Tamada. Took idea from his blog.
  • Working on date based Timeline similar to Facebook.
  • Not checked browser compatiblity. Will do that soon.
  • Currently adding new message appears at the top. Working on adding in any slot based on time.
  • Will be uploading the demo files tonight. In mean time you can have a look at the JS code http://www.pavanratnakar.com/demo/timeline/js/timeline.js
  • CSS code http://www.pavanratnakar.com/demo/timeline/css/timeline.css
  • Lots of bugs. It was just few hours of coding thanks to Srinivas Tamada. Will solve it as and when possible :)
  • Suggestions are welcome.
